verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
THOU ART WORTHY,
Thou art worthy, Thou art worthy, O Lord. Thou
art worthy to receive glory, glory and honor and
pow'r. For Thou hast created, hast all things
created; for Thou hast created all things. And for
Thy pleasure they are created; Thou art worthy, O
Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thou art worthy, Thou art worthy, Thou art worthy,
O Lord. Thou art worthy to receive glory, glory
and honor and pow'r. Because Thou wast slain
and Thy blood hast redeemed us from every
nation and tongue, and Thou hast made us both
kings and priests; Thou art worthy, O Lord.
